data.name: Defiance: 7th Legion
data.detailed_description:
Get the Defiance® 7th Legion DLC to join the elite forces of Yoshida Hiro! The New Frontier is at war: Empires grow, and displaced evils look for new victims. As a member of the 7th Legion, you’ll fight to liberate Paradise with new weapons, armor, and more!

Key Features:
  • New Faction: Yoshida Hiro’s 7th Legion has come to the bay area looking for recruits. Join their forces and reap the rewards.
  • New Weapons: The 7th Legion has developed a unique fighting style expressed in its new weapons and synergies.
  • New Shields: Wield hybrid Human-Votan tech shields designed to take down enemies on the New Frontier.
  • 7th Legion Recruit Kit: An outfit, gear, and title start your path to becoming an honored member of the 7th Legion.

For more information visit http://www.Defiance.com

data.supported_languages:
English*, French*, German*
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows XP SP2
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo 2.0 GHz CPU or better
  • Memory: 2 GB System RAM
  • Graphics: 512MB video card (NVIDIA GeForce 8600, ATI Radeon HD 2900, or Intel HD 4000 integrated graphics or better)
  • DirectX®: 9.0c
  • Hard Drive: 15 GB free hard drive space
  • Sound: DirectX 8.1 compatible sound card
  • Internet: Broadband internet connection
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 2.4 GHz CPU or better
  • Memory: 4 GB System RAM
  • Graphics: 1024MB video card (NVIDIA GeForce GTS 250 or ATI Radeon HD 4750 or better)
  • DirectX®: 9.0c
  • Hard Drive: 15 GB free hard drive space
  • Sound: DirectX 8.1 compatible sound card
  • Internet: Broadband internet connection
